tool_description: Cleans and normalizes text content by removing noise, handling encoding issues, and standardizing format for analysis.

text_content.description: Raw text content to be preprocessed

remove_urls.description: Whether to remove URLs from text

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text content for processing.
Text too long: Maximum text length is 50,000 characters.
Invalid encoding: Text contains unsupported character encoding.
usage: Provide text_content as the primary input. Optionally configure URL removal and whitespace normalization. Use this as the first step before other analysis tools.
